portfolioItems.title: CESNO Energy
portfolioItems.subTitle: Web Development
portfolioItems.summary: CESNO ENERGY is a dynamic web platform built for a leading energy company that specializes in renewable energy solutions as well as oil and gas services. This project highlights my expertise in web development for corporate entities and my ability to create user-centric, responsive web applications. The website features a detailed overview of the company's mission and values, an extensive list of services, and informative content on energy solutions and industry trends. The user-friendly interface and modern design ensure a seamless experience across all devices, making it easy for users to navigate and find the information they need. Key technologies used in this project include HTML, CSS, JavaScript,bootstarap and an Email service for handling the contact form. Explore the CESNO ENERGY website to see how I brought this project to life, and visit the GitHub repository for a deeper look into the development process.

portfolioItems.title: Bend&Select
portfolioItems.subTitle: Shopify Development
portfolioItems.summary: BendAndSelect is an e-commerce store powered by Shopify, offering a seamless shopping experience and shipping to customers worldwide. This project highlights my expertise in creating responsive, user-friendly Shopify stores with custom themes, global shipping integration, and optimized checkout flows, ensuring smooth performance across devices.

portfolioItems.title: SABI
portfolioItems.subTitle: PWA / Mobile development
portfolioItems.summary: Sabi is Africa’s largest B2B platform enabling informal trade across the continent. This project demonstrates my proficiency in developing user-centric, responsive web applications for the business-to-business sector. The platform allows users to manage storefronts, record daily sales, sell online, and order goods at wholesale prices. Key features include a Progressive Web Application (PWA) built with ReactJs, a mobile app developed with React Native, and seamless API integrations for efficient data exchange. The application ensures optimal performance and user experience across various devices. Technologies used in this project include ReactJs, React Native, Redux, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and REST APIs. Explore how I contributed to making Sabi the No.1 B2B retail platform in Nigeria.

portfolioItems.title: Belrald
portfolioItems.subTitle: Web Development
portfolioItems.summary: Belrald is an innovative edtech platform designed to streamline university management processes, enhancing operational efficiency and faculty-student engagement. This project highlights my ability to develop tailored solutions for the education sector. Key features include a debt management system that improves payment tracking and compliance for students. Technologies used in this project include ReactJS, Tailwind CSS, and API integrations to optimize payment processing and user experience.
